mapper.insert: insert into todo(tdno, content, state, tddate, pno, tdstart) values (todo_seq.nextval, #{content}, 1, #{tddate}, #{pno}, #{tdstart})
mapper.update: update todo set content= #{content}, tddate=#{tddate}, tdstart=#{tdstart} where tdno=#{tdno}
mapper.select: select tdno, content, state, to_char(tddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')tddate, pno, to_char(tdstart, 'yyyy-mm-dd')tdstart from todo where tdno=#{tdno}
select tdno, content, state, to_char(tddate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') tddate, pno, to_char(tdstart, 'yyyy/mm/dd') tdstart from todo where pno=#{pno} order by content asc
